snippet.title: Nippets - Open windows, pull blinds and shake trees to find items and return them to their owners!
snippet.description:
Play the demo on itch.io https://vatnisse-interactive.itch.io/nippets?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Nippets is a hidden object game. It is inspired by the joy of people watching and telling small stories. Set in a hand-drawn, interactive city, you must open windows, pull blinds and shake trees to find items and return them to their rightful owners. 

➡️ More from Vatnisse Interactive https://vatnisse-interactive.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More hidden object games https://itch.io/games/tag-hidden-object?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
